p:
The maximum inhibition percentage of H 2O 2 free radical scavenging assay was found to be 85.92±0.31% and 84.83±0.46% for CB aqueous and EH 70% ethanolic extract, respectively. The minimum is 56.05±0.48% and 56.57±0.36% for TP and HI in aqueous and 70% ethanolic extract ( Figure 10 and Extended data, Figure S7)
49 , respectively; the inhibition percentage for standard Gallic acid was 95.10% at 0.5 mg/ml of concentration.
